title: Donald Trump and golf
deleted: Following the [[2021 storming of the United States Capitol|2021 storming of the U.S. Capitol]], columnist Eamon Lynch speculated in ''Golfweek'' that the PGA would move the 2022 championship to a course not owned by Trump.<ref>{{Cite web|last=Lynch|first=Eamon|date=9 January 2021|title=Lynch: As Donald Trump is driven from the White House, he should find no safe harbor in golf|url=https://golfweek.usatoday.com/2021/01/09/eamon-lynch-donald-trump-no-safe-harbor-golf/|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=10 January 2021|website=Golfweek|language=en-US}}</ref>
